QuestData.Title: To Cross the Veil
QuestData.Description:
Pallessa found a scroll detailing the ritual.
We will need to take our positions and speak a chant, surrendering some of our anima with every word.
Your presence is vital. I ask you to use the censers to burn the incense as we meditate. The rest should unfold on its own.
QuestData.LogDescription: Aid Kleia in the Rite of Guidance.
